title: Mobile-Based Islamic Worship Guidance Competency Enhancement Program

context.additional_context: Requires workplace-integrated training for professionals, with a smartphone-centric access environment.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the fundamental procedures of Islamic worship (Wudu, Salah, Tashahhud, etc.)
Learners can complete weekly worship practices at an 80%+ rate using a mobile system
Learners can recite essential prayer texts (Dua, Quranic verses, etc.) with 90% accuracy during worship

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
